testcase.classname: Verify the API suites for places
testcase.name: Verify adding a new place via AddNewPlace api
testcase.system-out: Given Prepare the add new place api request.................................passed When User calls "AddPlaceApi" with "POST" request...........................passed Then Verify the response code is 200........................................passed And Verify the "scope" in the response body is "APP"........................passed And Verify the "status" in the response body is "OK"........................passed

testcase.classname: Verify the API suites for places
testcase.name: Verify deleting a place via AddNewPlace api
testcase.system-out: Given Prepare the delete place api request..................................passed When User calls "DeletePlaceApi" with "POST" request........................passed Then Verify the response code is 200........................................passed And Verify the "status" in the response body is "OK"........................passed
